arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Bayern unstoppable, Freiburg on fire, Union Berlin down TSG, Bochum and Kiel inseparable
arts.sum: Another thrilling bout of 15:30 kickoffs from across the Bundesrepublik has come and gone with fantastic football aplenty. Matchday 4 yielded impressive victories for Bayern Munich and SC Freiburg over Werder Bremen and Heidenheim respectively. Elsewhere, Union Berlin made early chances count against TSG Hoffenheim, while Bochum and Holstein Kiel played out a tense 2-2 stalemate to earn their first points of the season.

arts.ttl: The fairy tale of Heidenheim continues
arts.sum: The Bundesliga has had a couple of magical moments in its long history. Currently, there is another fairy tale, which is a great story of continuous development and success at the same time: Heidenheim and their unbelievable journey to the Bundesliga and the first international appearances in the club's history.

arts.ttl: Heidenheim vs Freiburg preview: Hosts look to bounce back
arts.sum: FC Heidenheim will look to resume their fantastic form from the seasons opening rounds after suffering a setback against Borussia Dortmund last time out. Meanwhile visitors SC Freiburg will see their away credentials tested with a tough challenge on the road.

arts.ttl: Preview: Heidenheim vs. Freiburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Heidenheim and Freiburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
